posts.post_content: I am moving soon and will be parting with my imperial cabinet of the 1871 Stratford Osceolas Team with a 17 year old Jim O'Rourke.  If interested, please PM me with an offer.

Nice piece. I just moved from Michigan 2500 square feet in finished basement to Florida no basement.  Went thru the same thing sold many large display items.

Joe

The item has been sold.

You are absolutely right Joe about space.  I only wanted to keep the items I can display and I only had room for one imperial cabinet.  I chose the one I had of the 1868 Cincinnati Redlegs.

Thanks for all that have shown interest.
